about_the_game:
Shop Is Done — Story-driven 3D Tactics-Horror game with microgames.

Move employees from task to task, satisfy customers, and follow the rules of the capricious clown puppet manager. Stay out of debt! Or face eternity as a lifeless puppet.

  • In the stomach-graveyard of a private equity firm's leveraged buyouts, travel from store to nightmarish store closing each one down.
  • Move and position units across the board while managing your available actions and mitigating debt
  • Complete microgames to progress tasks and satisfy customers
  • Control how much effort each unit puts into each action. Give it your all!
  • Complete all required tasks with your sanity intact, and escape to work another day
  • Do not, under any circumstances, defy your manager

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon violence, depiction of acts such as cleaning up bodily fluids, stylized blood and gore. Suspense, darkness, and depictions of fear.
